title: Judd Goobey: Less Artsy More Fartsy
description: Many poetry books promise cutesy, eloquent wit and charm. This is not one of those books. This is Judd Goobey.Packed with thirty disgustingly hilarious poems and deftly uproarious illustrations, Judd Goobey: Less Artsy More Fartsy explores the rich and universal culture of childhood in its purest and funniest form.
author: M. Tompson Lane
